entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who roars and slaps the hippogriﬀ's hindquarters. ("Go on, then!" roared Hagrid)

entities.name: hippogriff
entities.description: The hippogriﬀ is a creature with twelve-foot wings that can fly. (Without warning, twelve-foot wings ﬂapped open on either side of Harry; he just had time to seize the hippogriﬀ around the neck before he was soaring upward.)

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a specific hippogriff that flies Harry around the paddock. (Buckbeak ﬂew him once around the paddock and then headed back to the ground;)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who rides on the hippogriff's back. (he just had time to seize the hippogriﬀ around the neck before he was soaring upward.)

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: The Nimbus Two Thousand is a broomstick that Harry prefers to ride. (It was nothing like a broomstick, and Harry knew which one he preferred;)

relationships.description: Hagrid slaps the hippogriﬀ's hindquarters. ("Go on, then!" roared Hagrid, slapping the hippogriﬀ’s hindquarters.)
Harry rides on the hippogriff's back. (he just had time to seize the hippogriﬀ around the neck before he was soaring upward.)
Buckbeak flies Harry around the paddock. (Buckbeak ﬂew him once around the paddock and then headed back to the ground;)
Harry prefers to ride the Nimbus Two Thousand. (It was nothing like a broomstick, and Harry knew which one he preferred;)
